span.span: Governor Cuomo has announced that all New York State schools will remain closed

span.span: This announcement was made this afternoon in the Governor’s briefing and posted on his website:

p.span: We are awaiting the Executive Order related to this extension of the school closure and we will share more information as it becomes available. This is a very trying time for all of us and our students, families and staff are doing an incredible job working through all the obstacles and struggles this situation has presented us. I want to thank everyone, our students, parents, staff, food service workers and our principals for their creativity and persistence in meeting this challenge head on.

p.span: Please watch our website and Facebook page for a brief survey for you to give us your feedback on how we can address your concerns on distance learning.
